Collective Storytelling - 55 Word Story

02 February 2011

A short story in 55 words, written for my (will I get into the class, won't I get into the class) Collective Storytelling class with Marianne Petit.

Hotel

— Call me tomorrow, so I know you're still breathin?
she asked.

— You call me, I like the attention - besides, i don't have your number
he smiled

— Guy like you, girl like me; it doesn't end well â€“ never does

— Maybe…maybe.  But maybe we're different?

She sighed, wrote the number, then closed the door; already regretting.
